record.properties: Top = 358 Left = 65 Width = 1570 Height = 663 DataSource = .NULL. Name = "Dataenvironment"
record.methods: PROCEDURE AfterCloseTables Close Tables All ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 13 Left = 17 Height = 407 Width = 127 Alias = "mr_mods" Order = "filename1" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_mods" Name = "Cursor1"
Top = 15 Left = 179 Height = 362 Width = 106 Alias = "mr_instances" Order = "iname" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_instances" Name = "Cursor2"
Top = 18 Left = 319 Height = 524 Width = 112 Alias = "mr_mods1" Order = "" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_mods" Name = "Cursor3"
Top = 11 Left = 481 Height = 357 Width = 101 Alias = "mr_files" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_files" Name = "Cursor4"
Top = 318 Left = 774 Height = 90 Width = 173 Alias = "mr_enum_gameversion" Order = "gverlong" OrderDirection = 2 Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_enum_gameversion" Name = "Cursor7"
Top = 21 Left = 735 Height = 234 Width = 117 Alias = "mr_addons" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_addons" Name = "Cursor11"
Top = 294 Left = 987 Height = 90 Width = 90 Alias = "mr_modids" Database = ..\data\data1.dbc CursorSource = "mr_modids" Name = "Cursor10"

record.methods:
PROCEDURE Destroy _inisetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', thisform.mr_iguid)
ENDPROC PROCEDURE init2 *!* init2
local iguid
if not empty(thisform.p1)
thisform.mr_iguid = thisform.p1
else
thisform.mr_iguid = _inigetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', '00000000')
endif
thisform.mr_setinstance() ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_enabledoff *!* mr_enabledoff
local filenamen, filenameo, pfid1, pfid2, pfilename1, pfilename2, phash1, phash2, pifolder, piguid local pldesc, pmodid, result
select 'mr_mods1'
scan for mr_mods1.iguid == thisform.mr_iguid and upper(justext(mr_mods1.filename1)) = 'JAR'
m.filenameo = mr_mods1.filename1
m.filenamen = mr_mods1.filename1 + '.disabled'
m.result = _apimovefile(addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + m.filenameo, addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + m.filenamen)
if m.result # 0
m.pfid1 = mr_mods.fid1 m.pfid2 = 0 m.pfilename1 = m.filenameo m.pfilename2 = m.filenamen m.phash1 = mr_mods.hash1 m.phash2 = 0 m.pifolder = mr_instances.ifolder m.piguid = mr_mods.iguid m.pldesc = 'DISABLED' m.pmodid = mr_mods.modid
mr_logaddrecord(m.pfid1, m.pfid2, m.pfilename1, m.pfilename2, m.phash1, m.phash2, m.pifolder, m.piguid, m.pldesc, m.pmodid)
replace mr_mods1.filename1 with m.filenamen in 'mr_mods1' replace mr_mods1.ena with .f. in 'mr_mods1'
endif
endscan
thisform.gridmain.sethighlightbackcolor()
thisform.updateui()
thisform.refresh()
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_enabledon *!* mr_enabledon
local filenamen, filenameo, pfid1, pfid2, pfilename1, pfilename2, phash1, phash2, pifolder, piguid local pldesc, pmodid, result
select 'mr_mods1'
scan for mr_mods1.iguid == thisform.mr_iguid and upper(justext(mr_mods1.filename1)) = 'DISABLED'
m.filenameo = mr_mods1.filename1
m.filenamen = juststem(juststem(mr_mods1.filename1)) + '.jar'
m.result = _apimovefile(addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + m.filenameo, addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + m.filenamen)
if m.result # 0
m.pfid1 = mr_mods.fid1 m.pfid2 = 0 m.pfilename1 = m.filenameo m.pfilename2 = m.filenamen m.phash1 = mr_mods.hash1 m.phash2 = 0 m.pifolder = mr_instances.ifolder m.piguid = mr_mods.iguid m.pldesc = 'ENABLED' m.pmodid = mr_mods.modid
mr_logaddrecord(m.pfid1, m.pfid2, m.pfilename1, m.pfilename2, m.phash1, m.phash2, m.pifolder, m.piguid, m.pldesc, m.pmodid)
replace mr_mods1.filename1 with m.filenamen in 'mr_mods1' replace mr_mods1.ena with .t. in 'mr_mods1'
endif
endscan
thisform.gridmain.sethighlightbackcolor()
thisform.updateui()
thisform.refresh()
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_enabledtoggle *!* mr_enabledtoggle
local filenamen, filenameo, pfid1, pfid2, pfilename1, pfilename2, phash1, phash2, pifolder, piguid local pldesc, pmodid, result
m.result = 0
do case
case upper(justext(mr_mods.filename1)) = 'JAR'
m.filenameo = mr_mods.filename1
m.filenamen = mr_mods.filename1 + '.disabled'
m.result = _apimovefile(addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + m.filenameo, addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + m.filenamen)
if m.result # 0
m.pfid1 = mr_mods.fid1 m.pfid2 = 0 m.pfilename1 = m.filenameo m.pfilename2 = m.filenamen m.phash1 = mr_mods.hash1 m.phash2 = 0 m.pifolder = mr_instances.ifolder m.piguid = mr_mods.iguid m.pldesc = 'DISABLED' m.pmodid = mr_mods.modid
mr_logaddrecord(m.pfid1, m.pfid2, m.pfilename1, m.pfilename2, m.phash1, m.phash2, m.pifolder, m.piguid, m.pldesc, m.pmodid)
replace mr_mods.filename1 with m.filenamen in 'mr_mods' replace mr_mods.ena with .f. in 'mr_mods'
endif
case upper(justext(mr_mods.filename1)) = 'DISABLED'
m.filenameo = mr_mods.filename1
m.filenamen = juststem(juststem(mr_mods.filename1)) + '.jar'
m.result = _apimovefile(addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + m.filenameo, addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + m.filenamen)
if m.result # 0
m.pfid1 = mr_mods.fid1 m.pfid2 = 0 m.pfilename1 = m.filenameo m.pfilename2 = m.filenamen m.phash1 = mr_mods.hash1 m.phash2 = 0 m.pifolder = mr_instances.ifolder m.piguid = mr_mods.iguid m.pldesc = 'ENABLED' m.pmodid = mr_mods.modid
mr_logaddrecord(m.pfid1, m.pfid2, m.pfilename1, m.pfilename2, m.phash1, m.phash2, m.pifolder, m.piguid, m.pldesc, m.pmodid)
replace mr_mods.filename1 with m.filenamen in 'mr_mods' replace mr_mods.ena with .t. in 'mr_mods'
endif
endcase
thisform.gridmain.sethighlightbackcolor()
thisform.updateui()
thisform.refresh()
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_getcursedata *!* mr_getcursedata
if seek(mr_mods1.hash1, 'mr_files', 'hash') = .t.
_logwrite('UPDATE FILE DATA', mr_files.fid)
replace mr_mods1.aid with mr_files.aid in 'mr_mods1' replace mr_mods1.fid1 with mr_files.fid in 'mr_mods1' replace mr_mods1.aname with mr_files.aname in 'mr_mods1' replace mr_mods1.authorname with mr_files.authorname in 'mr_mods1' replace mr_mods1.gver1 with mr_files.gver in 'mr_mods1' replace mr_mods1.rtypename1 with mr_files.rtypename in 'mr_mods1' replace mr_mods1.filedate1 with mr_files.filedate in 'mr_mods1' replace mr_mods1.loader1 with mr_files.foldername in 'mr_mods1'
*!* SAVE LOADER TO BE USED WHEN SEARCHING FOR NEW FILES
if not empty(mr_files.foldername)
thisform.mr_loader = mr_files.foldername
endif
endif
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_getcursedatascan *!* mr_getcursedatascan
Select 'mr_mods1'
Scan For mr_mods1.iguid == Thisform.mr_iguid
DoEvents
Thisform.mr_getcursedata()
Endscan
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_getfolderdatascan *!* mr_getfolderdatascan
local afiles[1], fguid, filelen1, filename1, filespec, fileunc, hash1, ifolder, iguid, lnx, ncount local omod, omodprops, pfid1, pfid2, pfilename1, pfilename2, phash1, phash2, pifolder, piguid local pldesc, pmodid, rguid
if empty(thisform.mr_iguid)
_logwrite('NO INSTANCE SELECTED')
return
endif
_logwrite('SCAN START')
m.iguid = thisform.mr_iguid
select 'mr_mods1'
scatter blank name m.omod
m.omod.iguid = '00000000' m.omod.fguid = '00000000' m.omod.rguid = '0000000000000000'
*!* FIRST SCAN EXISTING RECORDS TO CHECK FOR MISSING FILES
scan for mr_mods1.iguid == m.iguid
m.fileunc = addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + mr_mods1.filename1
_logwrite('CHECK', justfname(m.fileunc))
m.hash1 = mr_fingerprint(m.fileunc)
if mr_mods1.hash1 # m.hash1 then
m.pfid1 = mr_mods1.fid1 m.pfid2 = 0 m.pfilename1 = mr_mods1.filename1 m.pfilename2 = '' m.phash1 = mr_mods1.hash1 m.pifolder = mr_instances.ifolder m.piguid = thisform.mr_iguid m.pmodid = mr_mods1.modid
if m.hash1 = 0
m.pldesc = 'DELETED' m.phash2 = 0
else
m.pldesc = 'HASH CHANGED' m.phash2 = m.hash1
endif
mr_logaddrecord(m.pfid1, m.pfid2, m.pfilename1, m.pfilename2, m.phash1, m.phash2, m.pifolder, m.piguid, m.pldesc, m.pmodid)
*!* BLANK MR_MODS RECORD FOR LATER REUSE
gather name m.omod
endif
endscan
*!* SCAN FOLDER FOR FILES
m.ifolder = mr_instances.ifolder
m.filespec = addbs(m.ifolder) + '*.*'
m.ncount = adir(afiles, m.filespec, '', 1)
for m.lnx = 1 to m.ncount
m.filename1 = m.afiles(m.lnx, 1)
if not inlist(upper(justext(m.filename1)), 'JAR', 'DISABLED')
loop
endif
m.fileunc = addbs(m.ifolder) + m.filename1
_logwrite('SCAN', justfname(m.fileunc))
m.filelen1 = m.afiles(m.lnx, 2)
m.hash1 = mr_fingerprint(m.fileunc)
m.fguid = strconv(_ubintoc(m.hash1), 15)
m.rguid = m.iguid + m.fguid
m.omodprops = mr_getmodproperties(m.fileunc)
*!* IF THERE IS NO RECORD FOR THE FILE, REUSE BLANK RECORD OR APPEND NEW
if seek(m.rguid, 'mr_mods1', 'rguid') = .f.
if seek('00000000', 'mr_mods1', 'IGUID') = .f.
append blank in 'mr_mods1'
endif
replace mr_mods1.rguid with m.rguid in 'mr_mods1' replace mr_mods1.upd with .t. in 'mr_mods1'
*!* NEW FILE ADD TO LOG
m.pfid1 = mr_mods1.fid1 m.pfid2 = 0 m.pfilename1 = m.filename1 m.pfilename2 = '' m.phash1 = m.hash1 m.phash2 = 0 m.pifolder = mr_instances.ifolder m.piguid = thisform.mr_iguid m.pldesc = 'NEW' m.pmodid = m.omodprops.mod_id
mr_logaddrecord(m.pfid1, m.pfid2, m.pfilename1, m.pfilename2, m.phash1, m.phash2, m.pifolder, m.piguid, m.pldesc, m.pmodid)
endif
replace mr_mods1.iguid with m.iguid in 'mr_mods1' replace mr_mods1.fguid with m.fguid in 'mr_mods1' replace mr_mods1.filename1 with m.filename1 in 'mr_mods1' replace mr_mods1.filelen1 with m.filelen1 in 'mr_mods1' replace mr_mods1.hash1 with m.hash1 in 'mr_mods1' replace mr_mods1.modid with m.omodprops.mod_id in 'mr_mods1' replace mr_mods1.aname with m.omodprops.mod_name in 'mr_mods1' replace mr_mods1.authorname with m.omodprops.mod_authors in 'mr_mods1' replace mr_mods1.env with m.omodprops.mod_environment in 'mr_mods1' replace mr_mods1.guidicon with m.omodprops.mod_icon in 'mr_mods1'
if empty(mr_mods1.guidicon)
replace mr_mods1.guidicon with mr_getblankavatar() in 'mr_mods1'
endif
if upper(justext(mr_mods1.filename1)) = 'JAR'
replace mr_mods1.ena with .t. in 'mr_mods1'
endif
if upper(justext(mr_mods1.filename1)) = 'DISABLED'
replace mr_mods1.ena with .f. in 'mr_mods1'
endif
*!* DONT DO THIS! mr_syncserverfolder checks mr_mods1.env and mr_modids.isclient ALREADY!
*!* if seek(mr_mods1.modid, 'mr_modids', 'modid') = .t. and mr_modids.isclient = .t.
*!* replace mr_mods1.env with 'client' in 'mr_mods1'
*!* endif
endfor
_logwrite('SCAN END')
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_getnewverdata *!* mr_getnewverdata
Local lnx, loader1
If mr_mods1.aid > 0
_logwrite('GET FILE DATA', mr_mods1.fid1)
*!* TRY THE SEARCH 2 TIMES. FIRST USING THE LOADER PARAM, THEN *!* USING THE SAVED LOADER NAME
m.loader1 = mr_mods1.loader1
Select Top 1 * From mr_fileversions ; Where mr_fileversions.gverlong >= mr_instances.gverlong1 ; And mr_fileversions.gverlong <= mr_instances.gverlong2 ; And mr_fileversions.aid = mr_mods1.aid ; And mr_fileversions.loader == m.loader1 ; And mr_fileversions.fid >= mr_mods1.fid1 ; Order By mr_fileversions.gverlong Desc, mr_fileversions.fid Desc ; Into Cursor 'sqlresult'
If Reccount('sqlresult') = 0 And Not Thisform.mr_loader == m.loader1 Then
m.loader1 = Thisform.mr_loader
Select Top 1 * From mr_fileversions ; Where mr_fileversions.gverlong >= mr_instances.gverlong1 ; And mr_fileversions.gverlong <= mr_instances.gverlong2 ; And mr_fileversions.aid = mr_mods1.aid ; And mr_fileversions.loader == m.loader1 ; And mr_fileversions.fid >= mr_mods1.fid1 ; Order By mr_fileversions.gverlong Desc, mr_fileversions.fid Desc ; Into Cursor 'sqlresult'
Endif
If Reccount('sqlresult') = 0
Select Top 1 * From mr_fileversions ; Where mr_fileversions.gverlong >= mr_instances.gverlong1 ; And mr_fileversions.gverlong <= mr_instances.gverlong2 ; And mr_fileversions.aid = mr_mods1.aid ; And mr_fileversions.fid >= mr_mods1.fid1 ; Order By mr_fileversions.gverlong Desc, mr_fileversions.fid Desc ; Into Cursor 'sqlresult'
Endif
If Reccount('sqlresult') = 1 Then
= Seek(sqlresult.fid, 'mr_files', 'fid')
Replace mr_mods1.fid2 With mr_files.fid In 'mr_mods1' Replace mr_mods1.filedate2 With mr_files.filedate In 'mr_mods1' Replace mr_mods1.filelen2 With mr_files.filelen In 'mr_mods1' Replace mr_mods1.filename2 With mr_files.filename In 'mr_mods1' Replace mr_mods1.hash2 With mr_files.hash In 'mr_mods1' Replace mr_mods1.rtypename2 With mr_files.rtypename In 'mr_mods1' Replace mr_mods1.gver2 With sqlresult.gver In 'mr_mods1' Replace mr_mods1.loader2 With mr_files.foldername In 'mr_mods1'
If mr_mods1.fid1 # mr_mods1.fid2
Replace mr_mods1.hasupd With .T. In 'mr_mods1'
Else
Replace mr_mods1.hasupd With .F. In 'mr_mods1'
Endif
Endif
Use In 'sqlresult'
Endif ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_getnewverdatascan *!* mr_getnewverdatascan
Select 'mr_mods1'
Scan For mr_mods1.iguid == Thisform.mr_iguid
DoEvents
Thisform.mr_getnewverdata()
Endscan
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_modupdatescan *!* mr_modupdatescan
select 'mr_mods1'
scan for mr_mods1.iguid == thisform.mr_iguid and mr_mods1.upd = .t.
doevents
mr_modupdate(mr_mods1.rguid)
endscan ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_refreshcurse *!* mr_refreshcurse
lparameters phashes
local ofp as 'fp' of 'mr_vcl' local aid, aname, authorname, fjson, iguid, lnx, lnz, ofile, slug
m.ofp = newobject('fp', 'mr_vcl')
m.ofp.fphashes = m.phashes
_logwrite('GET CURSE DATA')
m.ofp.fppost()
if m.ofp.fpresponse = 200 and vartype(m.ofp.fpojson.exactmatches[1]) = 'O'
for m.lnx = 1 to alen(m.ofp.fpojson.exactmatches)
m.aid = m.ofp.fpojson.exactmatches[m.lnx].id
*!* PROCESS EACH FILE AND ADD IT TO FILES TABLE IN CASE IT IS AN ADDITIONAL FILE *!* AND IT WILL NOT BE INCLUDED IN THE FILES API CALL
m.fjson = nfjsoncreate(m.ofp.fpojson.exactmatches(m.lnx).file)
*!* GET MISSING DATA FROM ADDONS TABLE (ADDON MAY NOT BE FOUND IN TABLE)
?seek(m.aid, 'mr_addons', 'aid')
m.aname = mr_addons.aname
m.slug = mr_addons.slug
m.authorname = mr_addons.authorname
_logwrite('PARSE FINGERPRINT', m.ofp.fpojson.exactmatches(m.lnx).file.id)
mr_fileparse(m.aid, m.fjson, m.aname, m.slug, m.authorname)
*!* UPDATE ADDON
mr_addonupdate(m.aid)
endfor
*!* ADD DEPENDENCIES
for m.lnx = 1 to alen(m.ofp.fpojson.exactmatches)
m.ofile = m.ofp.fpojson.exactmatches[m.lnx].file
if vartype(m.ofile.dependencies[1]) = 'O'
for m.lnz = 1 to alen(m.ofile.dependencies)
mr_dependencyupdate(m.ofile.dependencies[m.lnz])
endfor
endif
endfor
endif
ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_refreshcursescan *!* mr_refreshcursescan
m.hashes = ''
Select 'mr_mods1'
Scan For mr_mods1.iguid == Thisform.mr_iguid
m.hashes = m.hashes + Transform(mr_mods1.hash1) + ','
Endscan
Thisform.mr_refreshcurse(m.hashes) ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_setinstance *!* mr_setinstance
If Thisform.mr_iguid = '00000000' And Reccount('mr_instances') > 0 Then
Go Top In 'mr_instances'
Thisform.mr_iguid = mr_instances.iguid
Endif
If Seek(Thisform.mr_iguid, 'mr_instances', 'iguid') = .T.
Set Filter To mr_mods.iguid == Thisform.mr_iguid In 'mr_mods'
If Empty(mr_instances.iname) Then
Thisform.Caption = 'MODS - ' + _shortenpath(mr_instances.iguid, 240)
Else
Thisform.Caption = 'MODS - ' + _shortenpath(mr_instances.iname, 240)
Endif
Else
Thisform.SetAll('ENABLED', .F.)
Thisform.tbinstances.Enabled = .T.
Thisform.Caption = 'MODS - NO INSTANCE SELECTED'
Set Filter To mr_mods.iguid == '99999999' In 'mr_mods'
Endif
Go Top In 'mr_mods'
Thisform.updateui()
Thisform.Refresh() ENDPROC PROCEDURE mr_updatetoggle replace mr_mods.upd with not mr_mods.upd in 'mr_mods'
thisform.gridmain.sethighlightbackcolor()
thisform.updateui()
thisform.refresh()
ENDPROC PROCEDURE rm_cliptimer lparameters pcliptext
local winhttp as 'winhttp' of 'winhttp' local lalines[1], lnlines, lnx, localfile, result, url
if vartype(_screen.activeform) = 'O' and _screen.activeform.hwnd = thisform.hwnd
m.winhttp = newobject('winhttp', 'winhttp')
m.winhttp.settimeouts(60000, 60000, 30000, 60000)
*m.winhttp.setproxy(2, 'localhost:8888')
m.winhttp.option_enableredirects = .f.
m.lnlines = alines(lalines, m.pcliptext, 1+4)
for m.lnx = 1 to m.lnlines
m.url = m.lalines(m.lnx)
if left(m.url, 4) = 'http' and mr_geturlbase() $ m.url and '/download/' $ m.url
_logwrite('URL DETECTED', m.url)
_logwrite('RESOLVING LOCATION...')
m.url = m.url + '/file'
??chr(7)
m.winhttp.open('GET', m.url, .t.)
m.winhttp.send()
do while m.winhttp.waitforresponse(0) = 0
doevents
_apisleep(50)
enddo
if m.winhttp.responsestatus = 307
m.url = m.winhttp.getresponseheader('Location')
_logwrite(m.winhttp.responsestatus, 'LOCATION FOUND:', m.url)
m.localfile = addbs(mr_instances.ifolder) + justfname(m.url)
m.winhttp.open('GET', m.url, .t.)
m.winhttp.send()
do while m.winhttp.waitforresponse(0) = 0
doevents
_apisleep(50)
enddo
if m.winhttp.responsestatus = 302
m.url = m.winhttp.getresponseheader('Location')
_logwrite(m.winhttp.responsestatus, 'LOCATION FOUND:', m.url)
m.result = mr_downloadfile(m.url, m.localfile)
do case
case m.result = 0 _logwrite('DOWNLOAD ERROR', m.url)
case m.result = 1 _logwrite('DOWNLOAD OK', m.localfile)
case m.result = 2 _logwrite('FILE EXISTS', m.localfile)
endcase
else
_logwrite(m.winhttp.responsestatus, 'ERROR RESOLVING LOCATION:')
endif
else
_logwrite(m.winhttp.responsestatus, 'ERROR RESOLVING LOCATION:')
endif
endif
endfor
endif
ENDPROC PROCEDURE updateui *!* updateui
local icaption, sep
if seek(mr_mods.aid, 'mr_addons', 'aid') = .t.
thisform.imgavatar.pictureval = mr_addons.avatar
else
thisform.imgavatar.pictureval = mr_mods.guidicon
endif
if mr_mods.ena = .t.
thisform.tbena.pictureval = strconv('iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAABIAAAASCAQAAAD8x0bcAAAAcklEQVR4Aa3RgQWAYBRF4QMJoCGqAUIzJLRRgLZpgkSNVAIJxY + L3BQ6D3g + Hh4 / lzEymxnJUT2LRQu9TFgo7N6j5B01bBQeiXAwEDmU3Ig5V7JSA5WIQTETOy27iEEEdop4FFgnYpEy6Ptb0scHp / zaBa7PVhPkf310AAAAAElFTkSuQmCC', 14)
else
thisform.tbena.pictureval = strconv('iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAABIAAAASCAYAAABWzo5XAAAAPElEQVR4AWMY1EAViPcA8QFiMFStGjaD1gDxBxIM + gDWgw7gCvACTPWDyqBRg0YNomkWUSE104L1DFoAADDLRfQgho5aAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC', 14)
endif
if mr_mods.upd = .t.
thisform.tbupd.pictureval = strconv('iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAABIAAAASCAQAAAD8x0bcAAAAcklEQVR4Aa3RgQWAYBRF4QMJoCGqAUIzJLRRgLZpgkSNVAIJxY + L3BQ6D3g + Hh4 / lzEymxnJUT2LRQu9TFgo7N6j5B01bBQeiXAwEDmU3Ig5V7JSA5WIQTETOy27iEEEdop4FFgnYpEy6Ptb0scHp / zaBa7PVhPkf310AAAAAElFTkSuQmCC', 14)
else
thisform.tbupd.pictureval = strconv('iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAABIAAAASCAYAAABWzo5XAAAAPElEQVR4AWMY1EAViPcA8QFiMFStGjaD1gDxBxIM + gDWgw7gCvACTPWDyqBRg0YNomkWUSE104L1DFoAADDLRfQgho5aAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC', 14)
endif
m.sep = space(3)
m.icaption = ' ' + ; 'GUID: ' + mr_instances.iguid + m.sep + ; 'NAME: ' + mr_instances.iname + m.sep + ; 'VERSION ' + mr_instances.iminecraft + m.sep + ; 'LOADER: ' + mr_instances.iloader + m.sep + ; 'MINVER: ' + mr_instances.gver1 + m.sep + ; 'MAXVER: ' + mr_instances.gver2 + m.sep + ; 'PATH: '
m.icaption = m.icaption + _shortenpath(mr_instances.ifolder, 255 - len(m.icaption))
thisform.lblinstance.caption = m.icaption
ENDPROC

record.properties: FontName = "Consolas" FontSize = 8 Anchor = 14 Height = 144 Left = 12 ReadOnly = .T. TabIndex = 9 Top = 324 Width = 1140 ZOrderSet = 0 Value = IntegralHeight = .F. islog = .T. Name = "edtlog"
Anchor = 15 Height = 276 HighlightRow = .T. Left = 12 RecordSource = "mr_mods" Top = 36 Width = 1296 HighlightStyle = 0 _gridcontextmenulang = en autowidth = .F. Name = "gridmain"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE AfterRowColChange lparameters nColIndex
this.sethighlightbackcolor()
thisform.updateui() ENDPROC PROCEDURE DblClick thisform.mr_enabledtoggle() ENDPROC PROCEDURE getdynamicbackcolor lparameters pocolum as column
*!* http://materialuicolors.co/?utm_source=launchers
local ncolor
do case
case mr_mods.ena = .f.
m.ncolor = _hsl(300, 90, 90)
case mr_mods.fid1 # 0 and mr_mods.fid1 # mr_mods.fid2
m.ncolor = _hsl(60, 90, 90)
case mr_mods.fid1 = 0
m.ncolor = _hsl(0, 90, 90)
otherwise
m.ncolor = this.columnbackcolor
endcase
return m.ncolor
ENDPROC PROCEDURE opencontextmenu Local choice
this.ContextMenu.clear()
this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN')
mr_geturlproject(mr_mods.aid)
this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'GOOGLEIT', 'Google file name') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'COPYFILENAME', 'Copy file name') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'COPYCFURL', 'Copy project URL') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'COPYFILE1URL', 'Copy file 1 URL') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'COPYFILE2URL', 'Copy file 2 URL')
this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', sys(2015), '-')
this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'TOGGLEENABLED', 'Toggle enabled') this.ContextMenu.add('MAIN', 'TOGGLEUPDATE', 'Toggle update')
*!* If mr_mods.aid > 0
*!* This.ContextMenu.Add('MAIN', Sys(2015), '-') *!* This.ContextMenu.Add('MAIN', 'CURSE_OVERVIEW', 'Curse Overview') *!* This.ContextMenu.Add('MAIN', 'CURSE_FILES', 'Curse Files')
*!* Endif
*!* Endif
m.choice = this.ContextMenu.show()
do case
case m.choice = 'GOOGLEIT'
mr_shellexecute('https://www.google.com/search?q="' + mr_mods.filename1 + '"')
case m.choice = 'COPYFILENAME'
_cliptext = mr_mods.filename1
case m.choice = 'COPYCFURL'
if mr_mods.aid > 0
_cliptext = mr_geturlproject(mr_mods.aid)
else
if not empty(mr_mods.modid) and seek(mr_mods.modid, 'mr_modids', 'modid') = .t.
_cliptext = mr_modids.url
endif
endif
case m.choice = 'COPYFILE1URL'
if mr_mods.fid1 > 0
_cliptext = mr_geturlproject_files(mr_mods.aid, mr_mods.fid1)
else
if not empty(mr_mods.modid) and seek(mr_mods.modid, 'mr_modids', 'modid') = .t.
_cliptext = mr_modids.url
endif
endif
case m.choice = 'COPYFILE2URL'
if mr_mods.fid1 > 0
_cliptext = mr_geturlproject_files(mr_mods.aid, mr_mods.fid2)
else
if not empty(mr_mods.modid) and seek(mr_mods.modid, 'mr_modids', 'modid') = .t.
_cliptext = mr_modids.url
endif
endif
case m.choice = 'TOGGLEENABLED'
thisform.mr_enabledtoggle()
case m.choice = 'TOGGLEUPDATE'
thisform.mr_updatetoggle()
endcase
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 492 Height = 28 Width = 84 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_check_box_black_18dp.png Caption = "ENABLED" ToolTipText = 'ENABLE/DISABLE MOD|APPENDS ".disabled" TO FILE NAME' ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tbena"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click if mr_mods.ena = .t.
this.pictureval = strconv('iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAABIAAAASCAYAAABWzo5XAAAAPElEQVR4AWMY1EAViPcA8QFiMFStGjaD1gDxBxIM + gDWgw7gCvACTPWDyqBRg0YNomkWUSE104L1DFoAADDLRfQgho5aAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC', 14)
else
this.pictureval = strconv('iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAABIAAAASCAQAAAD8x0bcAAAAcklEQVR4Aa3RgQWAYBRF4QMJoCGqAUIzJLRRgLZpgkSNVAIJxY + L3BQ6D3g + Hh4 / lzEymxnJUT2LRQu9TFgo7N6j5B01bBQeiXAwEDmU3Ig5V7JSA5WIQTETOy27iEEEdop4FFgnYpEy6Ptb0scHp / zaBa7PVhPkf310AAAAAElFTkSuQmCC', 14)
endif
thisform.mr_enabledtoggle() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 468 Height = 28 Width = 24 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_cloud_download_black_18dp.png Caption = "" ToolTipText = "UPDATE SELECTED MOD" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tbupdate"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click _logwrite('PROCESS START')
= seek(mr_mods.rguid, 'mr_mods1', 'rguid')
mr_modupdate(mr_mods1.rguid)
thisform.updateui()
thisform.gridmain.sethighlightbackcolor()
_logwrite('PROCESS END')
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 360 Height = 28 Width = 108 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_cloud_download_black_18dp.png Caption = "UPDATE MODS" ToolTipText = "UPDATE ALL MODS WITH UPD COLUMN CHECKED" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 tbpicturesize = 18 tbpictureautosize = .F. Name = "tbupdateall"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click
_logwrite('PROCESS START')
thisform.mr_modupdatescan()
_logwrite('PROCESS END')
thisform.updateui()
thisform.gridmain.sethighlightbackcolor()
thisform.refresh()
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 336 Height = 28 Width = 24 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_list_alt_black_18dp.png Caption = "" ToolTipText = "SELECT MOD FILE VERSION FOR UPDATE" ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tbversions"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local fid
m.fid = 0
Do Case
Case mr_mods.fid2 > 0
Do Form mr_mods_pickfile With mr_mods.fid2 To m.fid
Case mr_mods.fid1 > 0
Do Form mr_mods_pickfile With mr_mods.fid1 To m.fid
Endcase
If m.fid > 0 Then
= Seek(m.fid, 'mr_files', 'fid')
Replace mr_mods.fid2 With mr_files.fid In 'mr_mods' Replace mr_mods.filedate2 With mr_files.filedate In 'mr_mods' Replace mr_mods.filelen2 With mr_files.filelen In 'mr_mods' Replace mr_mods.filename2 With mr_files.filename In 'mr_mods' Replace mr_mods.hash2 With mr_files.hash In 'mr_mods' Replace mr_mods.rtypename2 With mr_files.rtypename In 'mr_mods' Replace mr_mods.gver2 With mr_files.gver In 'mr_mods' Replace mr_mods.loader2 With mr_files.foldername In 'mr_mods'
If mr_mods.fid1 # mr_mods.fid2
Replace mr_mods.hasupd With .T. In 'mr_mods1'
Else
Replace mr_mods.hasupd With .F. In 'mr_mods1'
Endif
Thisform.updateui()
Thisform.gridmain.Refresh()
Endif ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 948 Height = 28 Width = 60 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_web_asset_black_18dp.png Caption = "LOG" ToolTipText = "OPEN LOG IN NEW TAB" ZOrderSet = 4 tbalign = 2 Name = "tblog"

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 1008 Height = 28 Width = 60 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_web_asset_black_18dp.png Caption = "PROJECT" ToolTipText = "OPEN PROJECTS IN NEW TAB" ZOrderSet = 4 tbalign = 2 Name = "tbprojects"

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 1176 Height = 28 Width = 36 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_open_in_new_black_18dp.png Caption = "OVERVIEW" ToolTipText = "OPEN PROJECT OVERVIEW URL IN WEB BROWSER" ZOrderSet = 4 tbalign = 2 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tblinkhome"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click If mr_mods.aid > 0
mr_shellexecute(mr_geturlproject(mr_mods.aid))
Else
If Not Empty(mr_mods.modid) And Seek(mr_mods.modid, 'mr_modids', 'modid') = .T.
mr_shellexecute(mr_modids.url)
Endif
Endif
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 840 Height = 28 Width = 60 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_web_asset_black_18dp.png Caption = "DEPS" ToolTipText = "OPEN DEPENDENCIES TAB" ZOrderSet = 4 tbalign = 2 Name = "tbdependencies"

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 1212 Height = 28 Width = 36 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_open_in_new_black_18dp.png Caption = "FILE1" ToolTipText = "OPEN PROJECT FILE URL IN WEB BROWSER" ZOrderSet = 4 tbalign = 2 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tblinkfile1"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click If mr_mods.aid > 0
Do Case
Case mr_mods.fid1 > 0
mr_shellexecute(mr_geturlproject_files(mr_mods.aid, mr_mods.fid1))
Otherwise
mr_shellexecute(mr_geturlproject_files(mr_mods.aid))
Endcase
Endif

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 228 Height = 28 Width = 72 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_refresh_black_18dp.png Caption = "CURSE" ToolTipText = "REFRESH CURSE DATA FOR ALL MODS" ZOrderSet = 4 Name = "tbrefreshall"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click
_logwrite('PROCESS START')
Thisform.mr_refreshcursescan()
Thisform.mr_getcursedatascan()
Thisform.mr_getnewverdatascan()
_logwrite('PROCESS END')
Thisform.updateui()
Thisform.Refresh()
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 156 Height = 28 Width = 72 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_autorenew_black_18dp.png Caption = "SCAN" ToolTipText = "SCAN MODS FOLDER" ZOrderSet = 4 Name = "tbscan"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click
If Empty(mr_instances.gverlong1) Or Empty(mr_instances.gverlong2)
Messagebox('SELECT MIN AND MAX MINECRAFT VERSIONS WITH "MINVER" AND "MAXVER" BUTTONS', 0 + 64, 'MODROBOT')
Return
Endif
_logwrite('PROCESS START')
Thisform.mr_getfolderdatascan()
Thisform.mr_getcursedatascan()
Thisform.mr_getnewverdatascan()
_logwrite('PROCESS END')
Thisform.updateui()
Thisform.Refresh()
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 300 Height = 28 Width = 36 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_refresh_black_18dp.png Caption = "" ToolTipText = "REFRESH CURSE DATA FOR SELECTED MOD" ZOrderSet = 4 Name = "tbrefresh"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click
if empty(mr_mods.hash1)
return
endif
thisform.mr_refreshcurse(transform(mr_mods.hash1))
= seek(mr_mods.rguid, 'mr_mods1', 'rguid')
thisform.mr_getcursedata()
thisform.mr_getnewverdata()
go recno('mr_mods') in 'mr_mods'
thisform.gridmain.sethighlightbackcolor()
thisform.updateui()
thisform.refresh() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 900 Height = 28 Width = 48 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_web_asset_black_18dp.png Caption = "JIJ" ToolTipText = "OPEN JAR IN JAR IN NEW TAB" ZOrderSet = 4 tbalign = 2 Name = "_tbcommand4"

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 1284 Height = 28 Width = 28 FontSize = 8 Picture = ..\res\3bars.png Caption = "" TabIndex = 7 ToolTipText = "MENU" ZOrderSet = 21 tbalign = 2 tbautowidth = .F. tbmenuoffseth = 6 tbautofontsize = .F. tbmarginv = 4 tbpictureautosize = .F. Name = "tbmenu"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local result, txt
This.tbmenuitemadd(1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 'Enable All') This.tbmenuitemadd(2, 0, 0, 0, 0, 'Disable All') This.tbmenuitemadd(3, 0, 1, 0, 0, '-')
This.tbmenuitemadd(4, 0, 0, 0, 0, 'Generate Markdown mod list') *This.tbmenuitemadd(5, 0, 0, 0, 0, 'Generate curl mod download list')
m.result = This.tbmenushow()
Do Case
Case m.result = 1
Thisform.mr_enabledon()
Case m.result = 2
Thisform.mr_enabledoff()
Case m.result = 4
mr_genmodlist_markdown(Thisform.mr_iguid)
Case m.result = 5
mr_genmodlist_download(Thisform.mr_iguid)
Endcase
ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 576 Height = 28 Width = 84 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_check_box_black_18dp.png Caption = "UPDATE" ToolTipText = 'ENABLE/DISABLE MOD|APPENDS ".disabled" TO FILE NAME' ZOrderSet = 4 tbmarginv = 4 Name = "tbupd"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click if mr_mods.upd = .t.
this.pictureval = strconv('iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAABIAAAASCAYAAABWzo5XAAAAPElEQVR4AWMY1EAViPcA8QFiMFStGjaD1gDxBxIM + gDWgw7gCvACTPWDyqBRg0YNomkWUSE104L1DFoAADDLRfQgho5aAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC', 14)
else
this.pictureval = strconv('iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAABIAAAASCAQAAAD8x0bcAAAAcklEQVR4Aa3RgQWAYBRF4QMJoCGqAUIzJLRRgLZpgkSNVAIJxY + L3BQ6D3g + Hh4 / lzEymxnJUT2LRQu9TFgo7N6j5B01bBQeiXAwEDmU3Ig5V7JSA5WIQTETOy27iEEEdop4FFgnYpEy6Ptb0scHp / zaBa7PVhPkf310AAAAAElFTkSuQmCC', 14)
endif
thisform.mr_updatetoggle() ENDPROC

record.properties: Anchor = 12 Picture = ..\res\noimage1.png Stretch = 2 Height = 144 Left = 1164 Top = 324 Width = 144 Name = "imgavatar"

Top = 0 Left = 132 Height = 28 Width = 24 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_top_black_18dp.png Caption = "" ToolTipText = "SET THE MAX MINECRAFT VERSION OF THE INSTANCE WHEN SEARCHING FOR MOD UPDATES" Name = "tbmaxver"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local nselect, result
m.nselect = Select()
Select 'mr_enum_gameversion'
Scan
This.tbmenuitemadd(Recno('mr_enum_gameversion'), 0, 0, 0, 0, Alltrim(mr_enum_gameversion.gver))
Endscan
_restorearea(m.nselect)
m.result = This.tbmenushow()
If m.result > 0 Then
Go m.result In 'mr_enum_gameversion'
Replace mr_instances.gver2 With mr_enum_gameversion.gver In 'mr_instances' Replace mr_instances.gverlong2 With mr_enum_gameversion.gverlong In 'mr_instances'
Endif
Thisform.updateui() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 108 Height = 28 Width = 24 Picture = ..\res\1x\outline_bottom_black_18dp.png Caption = "" ToolTipText = "SET THE MIN MINECRAFT VERSION OF THE INSTANCE WHEN SEARCHING FOR MOD UPDATES" Name = "tbminver"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click Local nselect, result
m.nselect = Select()
Select 'mr_enum_gameversion'
Scan
This.tbmenuitemadd(Recno('mr_enum_gameversion'), 0, 0, 0, 0, Alltrim(mr_enum_gameversion.gver))
Endscan
_restorearea(m.nselect)
m.result = This.tbmenushow()
If m.result > 0 Then
Go m.result In 'mr_enum_gameversion'
Replace mr_instances.gver1 With mr_enum_gameversion.gver In 'mr_instances' Replace mr_instances.gverlong1 With mr_enum_gameversion.gverlong In 'mr_instances'
Endif
Thisform.updateui() ENDPROC

record.properties: Top = 0 Left = 12 Caption = "INSTANCES" ToolTipText = "INSTANCES" Name = "tbinstances"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE Click _inisetvalue('MR_INSTANCES_IGUID', thisform.mr_iguid)
do form mr_instances ENDPROC PROCEDURE dropdownclick Local iguid, nselect, result
m.nselect = select()
use 'mr_instances' again in 0 order tag 'INAME' alias 'menu_instances'
select 'menu_instances'
scan
this.tbmenuitemadd(recno('menu_instances'), 0, 0, 0, 0, menu_instances.iname + ' - ' + menu_instances.ifolder)
endscan
m.result = this.tbmenushow()
if m.result > 0 then
go m.result in 'menu_instances'
thisform.mr_iguid = menu_instances.iguid
endif
use in 'menu_instances'
_restorearea(m.nselect)
if m.result > 0 then
thisform.mr_setinstance()
endif ENDPROC
